Highlights.name: LARGEST B2B MERCHANT ACQUIRING SERVICES
Highlights.description: We understand the rapidly changing payments landscape that is throwing new challenges for businesses in terms of merchant acquisition. We believe in flexibility according to product & market dynamics.

Highlights.name: PRECISION IN MERCHANT ACQUISITION SERVICES
Highlights.description: In an interconnected world, the backbone of a currency that is going cashless is to create and enable seamless digital transactions. The core of this process is a merchant acquisition ecosystem which is the primary interface between the bank and the customer. The steady growth of e-retail and retail has necessitated differentiated merchant acquisition services, which do not just end-to-end but are technologies, network, and knowledge-driven.

Highlights.name: SIMPLE YET SEAMLESS OPERATIONS IS WHAT DIFFERENTIATES US
Highlights.description: Our comprehensive and talented team has ensured that Plada is equipped with capable multi-taskers who are deeply educated & trained in the merchant acquisition business. We operate through carefully devised and moderated CRM systems and processes which focus on business efficiencies and easily scalable outputs

enhanced_description: PLADA INFOTECH SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED is a Mumbai-based BPO services provider established in 2010, specializing in catering services-oriented solutions to clients. The company offers a comprehensive range of services including merchant acquisition, field support, payroll management, and account management. Recognized as a payroll services provider under the 'Total Rewards' category, Plada Infotech aims to facilitate digital transformation for its clients. With a significant operational footprint, boasting a team of over 2,000 employees and approximately 19 regional offices, the company extends its reach to more than 212 cities across India. Their operational approach emphasizes excellence, a dynamic business model, and strategic targeting and positioning, with a strong focus on B2B merchant acquiring services.
